Wakurum certainly has very interesing properties. It is able to smoothly transport large amounts of data over long distances almost without any loss.
I tried to develop a coating for my cables from this material and it worked perfectly. When I connect these cables with a network the signals are being transmitted.

To prevent the problem of having a failing or overloaded network switch I used a special cable design. They have their own built-in splitter and amplifier which allows me to easily expand the network without loss of speed.
